location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Henry Hardy, in charge Bushire to the officer that may be at Muscat on his way as Resident in the Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy and translation of a report from Merza Ali Ackha, agent at Sheraz [Shiraz], concerning Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā's intentions to attack Bahrain. It is also informing him that the Senior Marine Officer, Captain Sealy, is at Bushire.
